l.s: samāśrayosamāśrayaāśrayo yaṃ haṭho mataḥhaṭho maṭhaḥmato haṭhaḥ/
samyaggomaya sāndrasārdrasāṃrdraliptam amalaṃlīptam amalaṃliptam abilaṃliptavimalaṃ niḥśeṣanirdoṣabādhojjhitamjantūjjhitam/
proktaṃ yogamaṭhasyahaṭhasya lakṣaṇam idaṃ siddhair haṭhābhyāsibhiḥ//
ṣaḍbhiryogaḥ praṇaśyatiyogaś ca naśyatiyogaḥ vinaśyatiyogo vinaśyati//
ṣaḍbhiryogas tu sidhyatiyogaś ca sidhyatiyogaḥ prasidhyatiyogo prasidhyati//
harati sakalarogān āśudoṣān āśudoṣān asu gulmogulphodarādīnādin
nabhibhavati caabhavati doṣān āsanaṃrogān āsanaṃ śrīmayūram/
śayanaṃ tu śavāsanamśayanaṃ ca śavāsanamśavāsanam idaṃ smṛtam/
śreṣṭhaṃ tatrāpi ca sukhetatrāpi ca sukhaṃtatrāpi ca sakhetatrāpi ca padmaṃtathāpi bhadraṃ [ca]tatra dvayaṃ tiṣṭhet
yonisthānakadvārakam aṅghrimūlam aṅghrimūlāmūlam aṅghrimūlāṅghrighaṭitaṃ kṛtvā dṛḍhaṃ vinyase
nmeḍhremadhye pādam athaikampādatathaikammāsyahṛdayeasya hṛdayeeva hṛdayeeva niyataṃ dhṛtvākṛtvā samaṃ vigraham/
siddhāḥ siddhāsanaṃsiddhā siddhāsanaṃsiddhā siddhāsanasiddhaṃ siddhāsanaṃsiddhāsanam idaṃ viduḥ//
śramadair bahubhiḥśramādau bahubhiḥkim ādyair bahubhiḥśramadairghyādibhiḥ pīṭhaiḥ

l.note: In V3,J8 this verse is found in the 3rd chapter at the beginning of the khecarī section.

l.s: vāmorūpari dakṣiṇaṃ cadakṣaṇaṃ cavidakṣiṇaṃ hi caraṇaṃ saṃsthāpya vāmaṃ tathātato
yāmyovāmodakṣojānvojāmvaujānūrūpari paścimena vidhinātasya bandhanavidhau dhṛtvāpṛṣṭe karābhyāṃ dṛḍham/

l.note: Description incomplete. Perhaps, the following verse is omitted by an eye skip early in the transmission: yathāśaktyā samākṛṣya pūrayed udaraṃ śanaiḥ/ yathāśaktyaiva paścāt tu recayet pavanaṃ śanaiḥ// (DYŚ 37)

l.s: kṛtvādhṛtvā saṃpuṭitau karau dṛḍhataraṃdṛḍhatarau baddhvā tuca padmāsanaṃ
gāḍhaṃ vakṣasi sannidhāyasaṃvidhāya cibukaṃ dhyānaṃ ca tactataśccetasicepsitaṃ/
muñcan prāṇam upaitimuñcat prāṇam upaitiprāṇaṃ muñcati yāti bodham atulaṃ śaktiprabhāvān naraḥprabhāvād ataḥprabhāvataḥprabhāvodayātprabodhodayāt//
mārutaṃ dhārayet yas tupīyate yas tupīvyate yas tupibati yastuyas tu pibati
hastau ca jānvoḥtu jānvoḥjānvoś catu jānunoḥ saṃsthāpyasthāpyasthāya

l.note: {thepoemline }ab is a repetition of ab; omitted in V3,J8.

piṇyākapiṃṇyākapinnākapiṇyāka is glossed as ṣalī in J8. hiṅgulaśunādyamapathyamāhuḥ//

l.note: V1 has tailāmlāloṇītīni kālikā bhā i(?) before this verse.

s.note: paṭolaka is glossed as palavala in J8. Cf. Brahmānanda’s comm.: paṭolakaphalaṃ paravara iti bhāṣāyāṃ prasiddhaṃ.
